name: Lucky and Cash
description:
Entry for the Retro VR Arcade jam 2018, Lucky and Cash is an homage to the super rare "lucky and wild" arcade cabinet produced in limited number in the early 90's.  Take a cruise through the heartland, mountains and the big city in your quest to chase down the mobsters that kidnapped your partner and bring their boss to justice!

Built for the oculus rift but may run on other devices via steamvr, has not been tested on vive or wmr.  

This is a seated, forward facing experience and should be comfortable for most users.

Instructions:

"grab" the wheel with your left "hand", left trigger to accelerate, left stick "up" to brake.  "Grab" your gun with your right "hand", if you need to shift to reverse drop the gun where you picked it up and use the shift lever to change gears as needed with your right "hand"  

If you are not centered in your chair in the middle of your playspace when you hit "play" you may need to "recenter" your view from the oculus menu once the game is running.  

Development: Devastatin_Dave

Art: Devastatin_Dave

Music: Herr Doktor & Stabs the Shook

Assets: Unity, Turbosquid, Cadnav 

Special Thanks: VRTK Community
